Text: tak amone̩ ojoji ojoji wewe anyʼaka kakini:
Owñ la akajo̩ agbagba abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi,
Ma ahi eju eke e-one̩ wane̩,
Todu Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du chenʼiko o̩jo̩
kpai abʼoli sida e-Le̩bano̩n du kʼi hi o̩la-wñ ne tʼatate̩ le̩ oji ma;
kpai abʼoji uwo uwo du ki gbo̩gba ma,
kpai abʼoji o̩do̩go̩ du ki gbo̩gba ma,
kpai abʼoji o̩ko̩ Tarshish ma chaka,
Ode ode du la atakpa rʼeju hioko.
Tak amone̩ anyʼef owo owo okuta kpʼef ura ura ane̩pe̩te̩
